cwn_entry.cwn_who: Richard Jones asked and Julian Brown answered
cwn_entry.cwn_what:
> There isn't any wiki written in OCaml is there?
This page:
http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?WikiEngines
lists GikiWiki:
http://wiki.woozle.org/GikiWiki
Though it doesn't look too much like it's of production quality at first glance.
